# Campaigns Page

> **来源**: <https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/campaigns-page-in-fortnite>
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-27T00:01:16.499585

---

From the dashboard, you can create and manage a campaign and find your [Sponsored Row](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/fortnite-glossary#sponsored-row) [campaign](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/fortnite-glossary#campaign) history. Review your historical data to bid smarter and find optimal days to run a campaign for your island. Get started by opening the **Campaigns dashboard** from the project menu.

[![The Campaigns tab is located on the main menu in the Creator Portal.](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/40908bd7-b33f-4494-9d72-3108d4d184bf?resizing_type=fit)](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/40908bd7-b33f-4494-9d72-3108d4d184bf?resizing_type=fit)

Click to enlarge image.

Campaigns are a way to increase the visibility of your published island. To create your first campaign, see **[Creating and Editing a Campaign](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/creating-and-editing-campaigns-in-fortnite)**.

## Campaigns Dashboard

This page provides a way to create new campaigns, manage your campaigns, and view campaign metrics. Each campaign is listed by the campaign name and includes campaign information at a glance.

[![An example of the Campaigns Dashboard and campaign history.](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/52807507-21f0-4c4e-b63f-324033ddd250?resizing_type=fit)](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/52807507-21f0-4c4e-b63f-324033ddd250?resizing_type=fit)

Click to enlarge image.

1. **Create campaign**: Click the button to open the New Campaign page and create a new campaign.
2. **Market History**: A collapsible chart that shows you the market history over the past seven days by default.

   [![An example of the Market History chart.](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/b799238a-61c5-40eb-afde-40fa4f53b251?resizing_type=fit)](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/b799238a-61c5-40eb-afde-40fa4f53b251?resizing_type=fit)

   Click to enlarge image.
3. Sort filter: Click the arrow to open a dropdown menu, then filter the campaign view by the criteria you select.
4. Campaign list: A list of campaigns that correspond to the Sort filter criteria. Each campaign displays its campaign details.

### Campaign Details

Each campaign has individual campaign details recorded on the Campaigns dashboard. You can see all of a campaign's details at a glance.

[![The breakdown of information included on the campaign history list view.](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/60c28667-9d35-4478-b524-682a5411ab82?resizing_type=fit)](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/60c28667-9d35-4478-b524-682a5411ab82?resizing_type=fit)

Click to enlarge image.

1. **Campaign Name**: The name of the campaign.
2. **Status**: This refers to the lifecycle of the campaign. Each status view includes a Last updated timestamp for transparency.
3. **Daily budget**: The amount you're willing to pay per day to sponsor your island.
4. **Delivered budget**: What you were actually charged (per day and in total).
5. **Delivery rate**: The percentage of planned daily budget actually delivered. (Daily Spent ÷ Daily Planned × 100).
6. **Max. bid**: Your maximum price per 1,000 impressions to be used in [auction](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/fortnite-glossary#auction).
7. **[CPM](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/fortnite-glossary#cpm)**:
   [Cost per mille](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/fortnite-glossary#cost-per-mille) (CPM) is the cost per 1,000 impressions in a Sponsored Row campaign.
8. **[Impressions](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/fortnite-glossary#impression)**: An impression is a player view of your island thumbnail.
9. **[Clicks](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/project-analytics-for-fortnite-games)**: Number of times players clicked your sponsored tile.
